summary: Allows a separate armour mesh set to be used for each race
descriptionHtml:
Allows you to bulk build the armours using Bodyslide then drop the set into the race folder.

I have only completed around 33% of playable armours and have set this up for Breton, Imperial and Nord.  I will provide a list of all armours completed soon, and will try to get all of these done ASAP as well as adding all playable races.

Instructions

For each race, bulk build the armour set using Bodyslide.  Copy the Data/Meshes/Clothes and Data/Meshes/Armour folders into that races folder i.e. Data/Meshes/Imperial
author: hobbs123
